scenes.action_text: 20TH CENTURY WOMEN by Mike Mills EXT. OCEAN - DAY High overhead shot looking down on the Pacific Ocean. TITLE: SANTA BARBARA, 1979. EXT. SANTA BARBARA - VONS PARKING LOT - DAY WIDE ON a plume of black smoke rising high into the air. CLOSER ON a 1965 Ford Galaxy engulfed in flames. DOROTHEA (55, short grey hair, Amelia Earhart androgyny) and JAMIE (15, New-Wave/Punk) jog their shopping cart toward the commotion, stunned to find their car in fl
